entry.title: Better without the mask
entry.summary:
Author: Baddie_with_Batty

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,765Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 87

Summary: When Clark Kent attends a Gotham charity gala, he expects nothing more than polite conversation and a stiff tuxedo.What he doesn’t expect is the unnervingly perceptive interest of Bruce Wayne. One private invitation to Wayne’s penthouse turns into a dangerous game of masks, power, and restraint.Clark’s never been good at saying no- and Bruce knows exactly how to make him break.ORBruce Wayne knows Clark's identity as Superman. He wants to see how far he can push Clark.

entry.title: crushing
entry.summary:
Author: crimsonvelocity

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,478Chapters: 11/25Kudos: 86

Summary: "Whatever happened in Metropolis three months ago- I need you to wrap it up. It makes you a goddamn liability.""You think I don't know that?" Clark's voice is hoarse. Low. "You think I wanted this to happen?"Dark eyes watch Clark."I'm not trying to be your weak link, Batman. I'm trying to survive it."

entry.title: open my hands that catch your wall
entry.summary:
Author: FlowerCitti

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,571Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 5

Summary: Bruce’s lips form the shape of his name, raindrops on cold skin, fingers clenched and unfeeling. He presses his comm and listens to it beep, unable to discern the sound of thunder from his own beating heart.“Sir?” Alfred’s voice, warm but tense in Bruce’s ear.His mouth opens and then closes again, nothing but a shuddering breath whispering past his teeth. Jason is dead. It runs through his head like an echo, an intangible recall.“Master Bruce?”Bruce swallows and disconnects the call. He’s dead. (Or, Jason Todd is dead. Clark Kent becomes an unlikely pillar in Bruce Wayne's grief.)

entry.title: Sunshine After The Darkest Night
entry.summary:
Author: Babydollblues

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,122Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Even at four years old, Tim knew that his family was struggling after the divorce. The darkness that had shadowed over their lives felt as if it would consume them completely.The solution to their problems came to him on his first day of preschool in the form of his 6’4 sunshine personified teacher, Mr. Clark. Maybe there was still hope that everything would get better for the Wayne Family.

entry.title: When Alfred’s Away, Bruce Will Play (Adopt)
entry.summary:
Author: Slowly_Falling_Away

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,507Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 552

Summary: As Alfred frowned at him disapprovingly, watching the nine children playing in the foyer, of which only two had been at the manor before the man had taken his three-month vacation, Bruce was ready to admit that he may have a bit of an adoption problem.With Alfred on vacation, Bruce speedruns adoption, and his family grows. Never mind the lack of sleep and increasing chaos, he totally has this. Featuring tired parent Bruce Wayne, smitten Clark Kent, late to the party Dick, good big brother Jason, chaos duo Tim and Steph, down for crime Kon, just chilling Cass, babies Damian and Jon, and confused Duke.
